entry.title: $2585 // ♦♦ Truly spectacular apartment ♦♦ building with all th
entry.content:
TEXT _K_a_t_e at______ 3~Four~7~Eight~3~Four~one~ 6~Eight~8 and mention this ad, referring to specific details (price, number of bedrooms & street or neighborhood). I also have plenty of other listings in the same area, just ask!

1 Bed / 1 Bath in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Willoughby Avs (G). Truly spectacular apartment building with all the bells and whistles. The owner spared no expense with a lavish layout that includes a massive living area, big bedroom, tons of closet space, high end appliances and in unit washer dryer hookup. Building boasts a stunning lobby, gym, bike storage and private parking. Area restaurants include MOLOKO, Brooklyn Blend, ReConnect Cafe, Project Parlor and Captain Dan's. *Price is net effective

AMENITIES
Central A/C
Exposed Brick
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Elevator
Laundry in building
Washer dryer hookup
Bike storage
Gym
Game room
Zipcar
Outdoor Space
Private parking
Common courtyard
Roof access
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Stone countertops
